contentencoded: Orders for expensive things that last quite a long time are down. There's news today that orders for durable goods fell sharply in July. Bill Stone, chief investment strategist at PNC Wealth Management, explains what happened, and what this means for the economy.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, August 26, 2013
